37.eng-name: Chapters on the description of the Day of Judgement, Ar-Riqaq, and Al-Wara'
37.ara-name: كتاب صفة القيامة والرقائق والورع عن رسول الله صلى الله

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Qutaibah] telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abu 'Awanah] dari [Qatadah] dari [Anas] berkata: Rasulullah Shallallahu 'alaihi wa salam bersabda: "Anak cucu Adam tua sementara ada dua darinya yang muda; ketamakan terhadap harta dan ketamakan terhadap usia." Hadits ini hasan shahih

chapter.eng-name: An Illustration About the Length of Life and a Person's Aspirations Increasing As He Becomes Old, and That He Will Become Old in the End
